name: Crabby
description:
Crabby is a very rudimentary game about an angry crab with an immense disliking for people, but an equally immense liking for shrimp.

Run and survive for as long as you can and earn points, though watch out for the crab catchers and people dropping their ice cream out of fear!

Crabby will move automatically, all you need to do is jump and attack!

Crab Walking Sound made by AugDog https://freesound.org/people/Augdog/.

Crab Crunch made by Hazure https://freesound.org/people/hazure/.

All other assets made by me.
